snippet.title: G Prime Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Come support us on Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=535791747

G Prime introduces players to a deep, compelling mystery set in a steampunk style universe. Billed as much more than a puzzler, the game takes place after the arrival of The Rain, a solar-system spanning shock wave of gas and dust that changes human history forever. The player is tasked with the important objective, as a sounding officer aboard the Ptolemy Station, to explore The Rain by firing sub-etheric reconnaissance rockets into increasingly challenging fields of iceteroids, theophosphorus, and quicksand clouds.


--SOMA GAMES--
TWITCH:  https://twitch.tv/somagames
STEAM GREENLIGHT:  http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197992845569/myworkshopfiles/?section=greenlight
FACEBOOK:  https://facebook.com/SomaGames
TWITTER:  https://twitter.com/somagames
INSTAGRAM:  https://instagram.com/somagames
http://youtube.com/c/somagames
SNAPCHAT: http://somagames.com/somaniloquy/wp-content/uploads/snapcode.png
FLURRY FRIDAY: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcojV30iYZWIrs8m89RhtNHUuQiMLzf-c
